title: ENCODE Experimental Data File
description: Schema for submitting data file Metadata for ENCODE

schema-version.description: The version of JSON schema files used in the generation of the example
schema-version.comment: Must match the specific schemas' `version` property

file_format.comment: Some of these types are for historical purposes only and are not valid new inputs.
file_format.title: File Format

md5sum.description: Calucluated MD5 sum of the file
md5sum.title: MD5 Sum

output_type.description: Coded description of the file purpose/contents for display
output_type.comment: Not all combinations of output_type and file_type are valid.
output_type.title: Output Type

replicate.description: Pointer to the experimental replicate for this file.
replicate.comment: Automatic submitters can supply a Replicate UUID

software.description: Pointer to the software used to generate this file
software.comment: Not valid for primary data files like FastQ.  Automatic submitters can supply an ENCODE Software UUID or unique name.
software.title: Software

assembly.description: Genome assembly that files were mapped to
assembly.title: Mapping Assembly
assembly.comment: BAM/BED and other mapped files only.

submitted_file_name.description: Original, local file name of the file (not unique, for reference only)
submitted_file_name.title: File Name

download_path.description: EDW download file path and name
download_path.title: Download Path

assembly.description: Genome assembly that files were mapped to
assembly.title: Mapping Assembly
assembly.comment: BAM/BED and other mapped files only.

date_passed_validation.description: The date which this file passed ENCODE DCC Validation
date_passed_validation.comments: Not to be submitted or updated by non-admin users.
date_passed_validation.title: Date of Validation
